Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER in variants that also contain Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER is immediately followed by Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER occurrences that lead to re-submission (i.e., followed later in the same case by Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER relative to the total number of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER executions
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER in variants involving multiple approval loops (i.e., variants with more than one occurrence of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER occurring in cases with Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER to Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER across all process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER events that occur after Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION but before Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of all process variants containing Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER that eventually reach Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER compared to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, given the goal to reduce rejections by pre-approver
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER that occur in the first approval cycle (i.e., before any re-submission)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases where 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' does not happen

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER among all activities executed by the BUDGET OWNER role (inferred from activity naming)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Frequency of variants where Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER appears more than once in the same case
Metric: the sum of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER grouped by year (2017 vs 2018) to assess temporal trends
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER out of all rejection activities (including Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR, Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE, and Declaration REJECTED by MISSING)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases
